title: Roman Conquest Tutorial
description: Learn the basics of warfare in a series of guided missions

missions.intro_text: Welcome, Commander. Your first task is to eliminate enemy scouts in the forest.
missions.outro_text: Well done! You've proven yourself in basic combat.

missions.intro_text: Intelligence reports indicate an enemy attack on our outpost. Defend it at all costs!
missions.outro_text: Excellent work! The outpost is secure and reinforcements have arrived.
